triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The paper's core approach uses reinforcement learning to train sub-policies for object manipulation.

triples.name: Actor-critic algorithm
triples.relevance: The paper employs the Soft Actor-Critic (SAC) algorithm, which is an actor-critic variant, to train each sub-policy.

triples.name: Robot learning
triples.relevance: The paper addresses robot learning for manipulation tasks using reinforcement learning techniques.

triples.name: Robotic arm
triples.relevance: The Franka Emika Panda arm is a robotic arm used as the hardware platform for the experiments.

triples.name: Mobile manipulator
triples.relevance: The paper addresses robotic manipulation, which is a core aspect of mobile manipulators.

triples.name: Robot end effector
triples.relevance: The end effector of the Panda arm is critical for grasping objects during the manipulation task.

triples.name: Hierarchical control system
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a hierarchical approach that decomposes grasp-constrained object manipulation into six independently trained sub-policies coordinated by a high-level stage selector.
